elm:value.code: [a997cc03-3e99-40eb-833a-6374c7750a3a |Observation procedure (procedure)]- ->(363702006 |Has focus (attribute))->[416093006 |Allergic reaction caused by drug (disorder)]- ->(246075003 |Causative agent (attribute))->[396425006 |Influenza virus vaccine (substance)]- ->(246112005 |Severity (attribute))->[24484000 |Severe (severity modifier) (qualifier value)];

elm:expression.elm:annotation: Received any influenza immunization on or after August 1 of last year
Received any influenza immunization on or after August 1 of the current year

elm:annotation.a:s: 150-day time-based rule processing refers to a whole system run looking every 150 days for any patient meeting the conditions defined below whose record may not have been accessed and who satisfies initial ECA criteria, to determine which patients are due for immunizations

logic.elm:annotation: Processed only after August 1 or before April 1

elm:operand.elm:annotation: Had a severe allergic reaction to an influenza vaccine or any of its components

logic.elm:annotation: Received any influenza immunization on or after August 1 of last year if today’s date is prior to April 1

elm:operand.elm:annotation: Received any influenza immunization on or after August 1 of last year

logic.elm:annotation: Received any influenza immunization on or after August 1 of the current year if today’s date is August 1 or later

elm:operand.elm:annotation: Today’s date is August 1 or later
Received any influenza immunization on or after August 1 of the current year

title.value: Influenza Immunization: General

textEquivalent.value: Identify the patient as an influenza vaccine candidate
Ensure that the Immunization guidelines for Influenza Vaccination are available to the clinical care team
